price: 32. Ha u dhowaannina Zinada13, waayo waa weji-xumo (if iyo aakhiraba) iyo dariiq aad u xun.
arabic: وَلَا تَقۡرَبُواْ ٱلزِّنَىٰٓۖ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ فَٰحِشَةٗ وَسَآءَ سَبِيلٗا
footnotes: 13. Iska jira dhammaan arrimaha kuu horseedi kara inaad fasho wax xun oo qudhun ah sida zino, gogol dhaaf,  khiyaano, iwm.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walā taqrabū al-zinā innahu kāna fāḥishatan wasāa sabīlan
